CustomField.formula: (CASE( Was_every_email_responded_to__c , "Yes",1, "No",0, 0)+ CASE( Were_email_inboxes_in_the_right_folders__c , "Yes",1, "No",0, 0)+ CASE( Is_scrumming_schedule_being_followed__c , "Yes",1, "No",0, 0)+ CASE( Inbox_has_required_templates_folders__c, "Yes",1, "No",0, 0)+ CASE(Is_the_tech_setup_of_the_inbox_correct__c , "Yes",1, "No",0, 0)+ CASE(Are_there_missed_leads_in_the_inbox__c , "Yes",0, "No",1, 0)+ CASE(Have_reschedules_been_followed_up_with__c , "Yes",1, "No",0, 0))/7
CustomField.label: Bionic Inbox Audit Score
